name: Ninja Duck
description:
Enjoy Ninja Duck!

Unfortunate has happened with this "Duck" .Everybody used to make fun of him.
But to show them what he got, he is on a mission.
This time he will going to prove that he indeed is a ninja.

He not only wants to show all that he is a ninja but the best of them with the greatest powers ever bestowed on ninja before.

Highlights:
-5 challenging levels(and we know that they’ll be more to come).
-Cool and Unique Graphics.
